--- xochitla2006 <xochitla2006@...> wrote:

> Unicron:
> 
> "Use the predacons against them, they are working together to destroy
> 
> us... but the old wounds still are flesh"

Scourge looked around with an incredulous look on his face," I don't
think so."

"We attacked the Maximal base and nearly laid waste to it!" Scourge
looked over to a view of Earth on one of the viewscreens, "When most of
the Maximals sped from thier own bases to help them repel us, they left
thier own bases unguarded." He gestured at Cyclonus, "When Cyclonus
defeated Rodimus Prime in one on one combat it left the Maximals
without the matrix." 

Scourge looked back at Unicron, "and you know what the Predicons have
done in light of all this?"

Scourge scowled, "NOTHING!" 

Scourge fummed. "No attacks on the unguarded bases, no attacks on the
recovering Maximal base or city. No taking advantage of the loss of
perhaps the Maximal's most powerful weapons, Rodimus Prime." 

Scourge resumed his position, his face dark, "If the Predicons once
wanted to destroy the Maximals, they are either too few, or too
cowardly to take advantage of the situation. They would be of no use to
us!"

Preston
(Da'minion)
